text: Neil McGrath (born 4 December 1942) is a former British auto racing driver. He regularly competed in the British Touring Car Championship. In 1981 he finished third in Class A and repeated this achievement again in 1985, finishing seventh overall. Official 1985 BTCC standings The cars he used were the Renault 5, Austin Metro and Rover Vitesse.http://www.racingsportscars.com/driver/results/Neil-McGrath-GB.html ==References== ==External links== *Neil McGrath at driver database Category:British Touring Car Championship drivers Category:1942 births Category:Living people
title: Neil McGrath
